Name: TereboGroup
Notes: A generator that creates a group of Octoboos that move on a set path. Obj_arg6 needs to be configured as the default number of Octoboos is 0.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which the Octoboos moves. If not set to -1, it will also enable gravity calculation. Default is 5.

Obj_arg6.Name: Number of Octoboos
Obj_arg6.Description: The number of Octoboos. Default is 0.

Obj_arg7.Name: Octoboo Spacing
Obj_arg7.Description: The distance between each Octoboo. If the value is 0, the Octoboos will be evenly layed out on the path. Default is 0.

Point_arg0.Name: Hide Type
Point_arg0.Description: If set to 0, this point allows the Octoboos to hide. In order to hide an Octoomba properly, this needs to be set to 0 for the first and last point of a path segment.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The Octoboos and Octoboos will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The Octoboos will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that the Octoboos moves on.

Group.Description: If one Octoboo from this group gets frozen by the Orange Luma, all Octoboos will stop moving.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
